Question: At the initial position, you are asked to navigate to a balcony with a green screen across the street on the left. At your current location, if the balcony with the green screen is not in view, what is the most relevant object in view? Where is this object?  
choose:  
A. The balcony with the green screen is already within my field of view.  
B. There is no green screen balcony, but I see a playground in the lower right corner of my field of view.  
C. There is no balcony with a green screen, but I see a group of tall buildings across the street on the left.  
D. The balcony with the green screen cannot be seen, but I see a parking lot on the right side of my view.  
E. The balcony with the green screen is not visible in my field of view, but I see a traffic light in the upper left corner of my field of view.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: C; Reason: At the initial position, the video shows a view of tall buildings across the street on the left side. Options A, B, D, and E do not accurately describe the scene at the initial position as depicted in the video frames.
